snippet: Greece’s Parliament on Wednesday voted to lift the immunity of another four of the Golden Dawn party’s lawmakers so they can face trial on charges of setting up a criminal organization.
abstract: Greek Parliament, as part of widening effort to clamp down on activities of Golden Dawn, votes to lift immunity of another four of the party’s lawmakers so they can face trial on charges of setting up a criminal organization.
lead_paragraph: Greece’s Parliament on Wednesday voted to lift the immunity of another four of the Golden Dawn party’s lawmakers so they can face trial on charges of setting up a criminal organization.
